DataElement.preferredName: Procedure Specimen Association Class Input Flag java.lang.Boolean
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A particular course of action intended to achieve a result.:A sample or part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodil:In UML modeling, an association that is also a class.  It not only connects a set of classes, but also defines a set of features that belong to the relationship itself._Anything added into a sytem.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true._Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A particular course of action intended to achieve a result.:A sample or part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodil:In UML modeling, an association that is also a class.  It not only connects a set of classes, but also defines a set of features that belong to the relationship itself.

Concepts.definition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
In UML modeling, an association that is also a class.  It not only connects a set of classes, but also defines a set of features that belong to the relationship itself.

Property.preferredDefinition: Anything added into a sytem.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
